mapper.subject: Schedule Your BrainOps Consultation
mapper.html:
Hi {{1.name}},

Thank you for your interest in scheduling a consultation with BrainOps!

Based on your request to discuss:

{{1.discussion_topics}}

Please click the link below to schedule a time that works best for you:

Schedule Your Consultation

The consultation will be 30 minutes via video call, where we'll:

  • Discuss your specific needs and challenges
  • Explore how BrainOps can help
  • Answer any questions you have
  • Outline potential next steps

If you have any questions before our call, please don't hesitate to reply to this email.

Looking forward to speaking with you!

Best regards,
The BrainOps Team

mapper.html:
Hi {{2.payload.name}},

Your consultation with BrainOps is confirmed!

Meeting Details

Date: {{formatDate(2.payload.event.start_time; 'dddd, MMMM D, YYYY')}}
Time: {{formatDate(2.payload.event.start_time; 'h:mm A')}} ({{2.payload.event.timezone}})
Duration: 30 minutes
Location: Join Video Call

We'll be discussing:

{{2.payload.questions_and_answers.discussion_topics}}

To prepare for our call:

  • Think about your specific goals and challenges
  • Have any relevant project details or examples ready
  • Test your video/audio before the call
  • Find a quiet space for our conversation

You should have received a calendar invitation with all the details. If you need to reschedule, you can do so through the link in that invitation.

Looking forward to our conversation!

Best regards,
The BrainOps Team
